MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH37 postcode area of Pathhead. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.30pm to replace faulty overhead equipment at Soutra Mains House and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.47pm on Friday 13th November 2020.
